goal.en: The objective of this course is to learn and apply engineering mechanics.
goal.ch: 讓同學了解應用力學之相關知識，對未來之力學課程有初步之基礎。

content.en:
1.Basic theory
2. Force and vector
3.Equilibrium
4.Force analysis
5.Equilibrium of rigid body
6.structural analysis
7. Stress Analysis
8.Friction force
9.Center of gravity and second moment
10.Virtual work
content.ch:
1.基本定理
2.力與向量
3.質點平衡
4. 合力分析
5. 剛體平衡
6. 結構分析
7. 內力分析
8. 摩擦力作用
9.質心重心與二次矩
10.虛功原理

textbook.en: Textbook: Vector Mechanics for Engineers - STATICS (12th Edition ) by F.P. Beer, Johnston, Mazurek, Sanghi Reference: Engineering Mechaincs - Statics by R.C Hibbeler (14th Edition in SI Units)
textbook.ch: Textbook: Vector Mechanics for Engineers - STATICS (12th Edition ) by F.P. Beer, Johnston, Mazurek, Sanghi Reference: Engineering Mechaincs - Statics by R.C Hibbeler (14th Edition in SI Units)

grading.ch: 作業 10％, 4 次期中考試 72％, 期末考 18％“

flex_desc.ch: 利用線上教學錄影彈性授課

domain.en: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程
domain.ch: 專業基礎學科 、 工程實務與應用 、 力學及結構工程

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public
